Backgrounds

Class BackgroundRunning

  • java.lang.Object
    • Backgrounds.Background
      • Backgrounds.BackgroundRunning

  • public class BackgroundRunning
extends Background
    Creates a moving background where the changes in x and y can be easily manipulated.
    Version:
    May 24, 2017
    Author:
    Ritik Batra and Johnson Ku, Period: 2, Assignment: JavaRun, Sources: none
